languages.text: "Моего лучшего помощника этому… бюрократу на побегушки? Лучше бы псу скормили, честное слово..."

traits.locale_text: "Моего лучшего матроса этому… бюрократу на побегушки? Лучше бы псу скормили, честное слово. Но я спорить не смею. Вам виднее, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."
languages.original_text: "Моего лучшего помощника этому… бюрократу на побегушки? Лучше бы псу скормили, честное слово..."

traits.locale_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."
"Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

"Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

languages.text: 「私の最も優秀なクルーを、あの…官僚の使い走りとして引き渡せってことですか？いっそ犬の餌にされた方がまだマシだと思いますがね…」
languages.original_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

traits.locale_text: 「私の最も優秀なクルーを、あの…官僚の使い走りとして引き渡せってことですか？いっそ犬の餌にされた方がまだマシだと思いますがね…」

languages.text: "En iyi tayfamı ayak işlerinde kullansın diye o... Bürokrata mı vereyim? Açıkçası köpeklere yem olduğunu görmeyi yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

traits.locale_text: "En iyi tayfamı ayak işlerinde kullansın diye o... Bürokrata mı vereyim? Açıkçası köpeklere yem olduğunu görmeyi yeğlerim."

languages.text: «¿Enviar a mi mejor tripulante a ese burócrata para que lo use como recadista? Sinceramente, casi prefiero echárselo al perro...».
languages.original_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Enviar a mi mejor tripulante a ese burócrata para que lo use como recadista? Sinceramente, casi prefiero echárselo al perro...».

languages.text: “居然让我最厉害的船员……去给那个死胖子跑腿？说真的，我宁可把他拉出去喂狗……”
languages.original_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

traits.locale_text: “居然让我最厉害的船员……去给那个死胖子跑腿？说真的，我宁可把他拉出去喂狗……”

languages.text: « Vous voulez mettre mon meilleur élément au service de ce... bureaucrate qui en fera un simple garçon de courses ? Je crois que je préférerais qu'il finisse dans le gosier de ce chien... »
languages.original_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez mettre mon meilleur élément au service de ce... bureaucrate qui en fera un simple garçon de courses ? Je crois que je préférerais qu'il finisse dans le gosier de ce chien... »

languages.text: "Ich soll meinen besten Mann diesem ... Bürokraten für Botendienste überlassen? Da werfe ich ihn ja lieber dem Hund zum Fraß vor ..."
languages.original_text: "Give my best crewman to that... bureaucrat to use as an errand boy? I'd rather see him fed to the dog, honestly..."
